MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CW7 postcode area of Winsford, affecting properties in Grange Lane and surrounding streets.  This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:32PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:10PM on 4th December 2020
